title: Dr Amit Kumar
description: Dr. Amit Kumar (BPT, MPT (Neuro), DOMP (Canada), Certified Chiropractor) has been treating patients with history of long neurological illnesses, relating to mobility, brain and spinal problems since last 12 years.

title: Dr Pohap Singh
description: Dr. Pohap singh has certified in manipulation , cyarix, PRT, MET, MFR and mobilization . He completed BPT from SGT University gurugram in 2018 and MPT in ORTHOPAEDICS from gurugram University

title: Dr Kavita Sharma
description: Clinical Hypnotherapist/Age Regression Therapist/Inner Child Healer/ Registered Consultant

title: Dr Neha Chandel
description: Masters in Nutrition. Done internship at PGI Chandigarh.. Have 7.5 years experience former Dietitian at Artimis Gurgaon.

title: Dr Shalini Rokkam
description: Fellowship in diabetology from medvatsity London. Worked as junior resident in fortis Gurgaon in nephrology and renal transplant unit
